tool_description: Real-time text translation with over 100+ supported languages.
name: Text Translate
title: Text Translate

api_list.name: languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-translate3.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-translate3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-translate3.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-translate3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
